title: Math Test Simulation 2024 Edition Grade One

questions.question: What is the area of a rectangle with length 5 and width 3?
questions.explanation: The area of a rectangle is calculated as length × width, so 5 × 3 = 15.
questions.meta_keywords: Math test, area of rectangle, geometry

questions.question: What is the solution to the equation 3x - 9 = 0?
questions.explanation: To solve 3x - 9 = 0, add 9 to both sides to get 3x = 9, then divide by 3 to find x = 3.
